results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: «እኛ ወደ መጀመሪያይቱ ኹነታ ተመላሾች ነን?» ይላሉ፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: «ይህቺ ያን ጊዜ ባለ ከሳራ መመለስ ናት» ይላሉ፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ወዲያውኑም እነርሱ እንቅልፍ በሌለባት (ምድር) ላይ ይኾናሉ፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
